trans-unit.source: Defines an MSBuild task that creates or removes registry keys that are needed to run or uninstall an add-in for the 2007 Microsoft Office system.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个 MSBuild 任务，该任务创建或删除运行或卸载 2007 Microsoft Office 系统的加载项所需的注册表项。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Set all of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration> properties, and then call <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Execute%2A> to run this build task.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration>属性，，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Execute%2A>运行此生成任务。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Build Engine uses <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks> to build and deploy Office solutions.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Build Engine 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks>生成和部署 Office 解决方案。

trans-unit.source: However, you can create your own build system by using these classes and the MSBuild XML-based project files.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以使用这些类并基于 MSBuild XML 项目文件来创建你自己生成系统。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [MSBuild Reference](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[MSBuild 参考](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the add-in being registered.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置注册的加载项的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the name of the add-in being registered.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，它表示要注册的外接程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.AddInName%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.AddInName%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the description of the add-in being registered.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置注册的加载项的说明。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the description of the add-in being registered.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，表示要注册的外接程序的说明。

trans-unit.source: Creates or removes registry keys that are needed to run or uninstall an add-in for the 2007 Microsoft Office system.
trans-unit.target: 创建或删除运行或卸载 2007 Microsoft Office 系统的加载项所需的注册表项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the registry keys were successfully added or removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功添加或删除注册表项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alternate name of the add-in being registered.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置注册的加载项的备用名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the alternate name of the add-in being registered.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，表示要注册的外接程序的备用名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.FriendlyName%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.FriendlyName%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the load behavior of the add-in being registered.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置注册的加载项的加载行为。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that represents the load behavior of the add-in being registered.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> ，它表示要注册的外接程序加载行为。

trans-unit.source: For a list of load behavior values, see [Registry Entries for VSTO Add-ins](/visualstudio/vsto/registry-entries-for-vsto-add-ins.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关负载行为值的列表，请参阅[VSTO 外接程序的注册表项](/visualstudio/vsto/registry-entries-for-vsto-add-ins.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.LoadBehavior%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.LoadBehavior%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Microsoft Office application for which the add-in is being registered.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置正在为其注册加载项的 Microsoft Office 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the Microsoft Office application for which the add-in is being registered.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.String" />表示为其外接程序正在注册 Microsoft Office 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.OfficeApplication%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.OfficeApplication%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to unregister the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否注销加载项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Execute" /> will unregister the add-in; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Execute" />将外接程序中注销; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the add-in being registered.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置正在注册的加载项的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the URL of the add-in being registered.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，表示要注册的外接程序的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Url%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Url%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.SetOffice2007AddInRegistration.Execute%2A>调用。
